LanguageData.SmallIntestine.label: small intestine
LanguageData.BionicSmallIntestine.label: bionic small intestine
LanguageData.BionicSmallIntestine.description: An advanced artificial intestine. A set of sensors and chemical synthesizers efficiently digest nearly any energy-bearing foodstuff. An integrated lattice-dust healing system automatically repairs any damage caused by the powerful acids. It is better than a biological small intestine in almost every way.
LanguageData.LargeIntestine.label: large intestine
LanguageData.BionicLargeIntestine.label: bionic large intestine
LanguageData.BionicLargeIntestine.description: An advanced artificial intestine. A set of sensors and chemical synthesizers efficiently digest nearly any energy-bearing foodstuff. An integrated lattice-dust healing system automatically repairs any damage caused by the powerful acids. It is better than a biological large intestine in almost every way.
